definition: disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)

sentences.english: The barrenness of their effort is due to poor management.
sentences.chinese: 他們努力的徒勞無益歸咎於管理不善。

sentences.english: True philosophy was supplanted by dogmatic opinions. The pundits took delight in vain polemics .
sentences.chinese: 梵文學者爲了徒勞無益的辯論術而感到高興。

sentences.english: The matter itself I could not deny, and vain was every endeavour to soften it.
sentences.chinese: 事情本身我無法否認，企圖大事化小也是徒勞無益的。

sentences.english: Catch the wind with a net.
And there's a real sense that it isn't worth doing if it won't change the world.
sentences.chinese: 如果無法改變世界，那着實會有總徒勞無益的想法。

sentences.english: This attempt is actually in vain.
sentences.chinese: 這種企圖其實是徒勞無益的。

sentences.english: What's gone and what's past help, Should be past grief.
sentences.chinese: 已經過去而又無能爲力的事，悲傷是徒勞無益的。

sentences.english: PhD and degree are useless, unless you work to glorify God.
sentences.chinese: 博士及學位都是徒勞無益的，除非你的工作能榮耀神。

sentences.english: Thou shalt not worry, for worry is the most unproductive of all human activities.
sentences.chinese: 你不用擔心，擔心是人類所有活動中最爲徒勞無益。

sentences.english: He must work according to the cards, or not at all.
sentences.chinese: 他必須依據卡片編輯，否則的話就徒勞無益。

sentences.english: Such an unproductive waste of time and energy.
sentences.chinese: 這真是時間和精力的浪費，徒勞無益。

sentences.english: The years of ineffectual service count big in the bestowal of rewards.
sentences.chinese: 幾年徒勞無益的服務，在論功行賞時就大有關係。

sentences.english: Tom is so infirm of purpose that it is useless to ask him for advice.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆這人優柔寡斷，向他徵求意見是徒勞無益的。

sentences.english: I do not think that your illustrious ancestor toyed idly with variations.
sentences.chinese: 我不信您顯赫的祖先會徒勞無益地玩弄不同的寫法。

sentences.english: The enforcement of such laws, of course, has been an exercise in futility.
sentences.chinese: 實施這樣的法律，當然也是徒勞無益的。

sentences.english: We're not going to run around in circles forever.
sentences.chinese: 我們並不想一直徒勞無益。
